articles.author: ABC7 Chicago Digital Team, Lissette Nuñez
articles.title: Chicago snow accumulation: Winter Storm Warning issued, dangerous driving conditions prompts some CPS school closings Monday - ABC7 Chicago
articles.description: Some of areas on Northwest Indiana have seen 6 to 12 inches of snow.
articles.content:
CHICAGO (WLS) -- Drivers could see dangerous conditions on the roads as overnight snowfall blanketed the Chicago area.
Some schools in the Chicago area and Northwest Indiana announced school closure… [+3034 chars]
